Plot: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when their father announces he is terminally ill.
Title: The Royal Tenenbaums
Actors: Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow
tomatoConsensus: The Royal Tenenbaums is a delightful adult comedy with many quirks and a sense of poignancy. Many critics especially praised Hackman's performance.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 45 nominations.
